abstract: Tunisia declares curfew in Kasserine after several demonstrators and police officers are injured in clashes over lack of jobs.

headline.print_headline: Africa; Tunisia: Protests Prompt a Curfew

snippet: Tunisia on Tuesday declared a curfew in Kasserine after clashes between the police and more than 1,000 young protesters demonstrating for jobs.
lead_paragraph: Tunisia on Tuesday declared a curfew in Kasserine after clashes between the police and more than 1,000 young protesters demonstrating for jobs.
